name.ja: <ruby>六<rt>む</rt></ruby><ruby>世<rt>せ</rt></ruby><ruby>壊<rt>かい</rt></ruby>＝パライゾス

text.en: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Kashtira" monster from your Deck to your hand. Monsters you control gain 100 ATK/DEF for each different Attribute among the monsters on the field. If "Kashtira Shangri-Ira" you control activates its effect: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it. You can only use this effect of "Prime Planet Paraisos" once per turn. You can only activate 1 "Prime Planet Paraisos" per turn.
